actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a 200 percent deduction for amounts paid or incurred for training employees.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a 200 percent deduction to employers for amounts paid or incurred for training employees. Sets forth revenue offset provisions.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a 200 percent deduction for amounts paid or incurred for training employees.
